title: Professor Course Load
description: Write a query to display each professor's name and the number of courses they teach. Include professors who teach 0 courses. Display name and course_count, ordered by course count descending.
hint: Use LEFT JOIN between professors and courses, GROUP BY professor name.
solution: SELECT professors.name, COUNT(courses.course_id) as course_count FROM professors LEFT JOIN courses ON professors.professor_id = courses.professor_id GROUP BY professors.name ORDER BY course_count DESC
